short_summary: Telefilm is seeking services for an Appian Architect and Analyst to support two projects: Project CAB and Project CORPO. The successful candidate will work on implementing a new system for the Telefilm Canada's Principal system, as well as other responsibilities.
description: The position requires an Appian Architect/Senior Analyst to support the implementation of a new project system for the Telefilm Canada's Principal project. The ideal candidate should have experience in implementing process improvements and have the ability to work on a team to meet tight deadlines. The Appian Architect will also be responsible for implementing a new corporate system for Diversity & Inclusion, as well as other initiatives. The candidate should have experience in coding and integrating features into the system based on the corporation's objectives.
